mapper.insert: insert into member values(seq_member.nextval, #{memberName}, #{memberId}, #{memberPwd}, #{memberBirth}, #{memberGender}, #{memberPhone}, #{memberEmail}, #{memberNickname}, default, default, default)
mapper.select: select * from member where member_id = #{id} and status = 'Y'

select b.board_no, b.title, b.content, b.create_date, b.board_status, c.category_name from board b join category c on b.category_no = c.category_no left join participant p on b.board_no = p.board_no and p.member_no = (select member_no from member where member_id = #{memberId}) where b.member_no = (select member_no from member where member_id = #{memberId}) or p.member_no is not null order by b.create_date desc

select b.*, c.category_name, l.location_name from board b join category c on b.category_no = c.category_no join location l on b.location_no = l.location_no where b.member_no = (select member_no from member where member_id = #{memberId}) order by b.create_date desc
select m.* from member m join participant p on m.member_no = p.member_no where p.board_no = #{boardNo}
mapper.update: update participant set status = 'a' where board_no = #{boardNo} and member_no = #{participantId}
update participant set status = 'r' where board_no = #{boardNo} and member_no = #{participantId}
mapper.select: select * from image where bu_no = #{memberNo} and delimiter = 'U'
